# Function: SkipManDown()

```ts
function SkipManDown(player, skipManDown): void;
```

Defined in: [mod/index.d.ts:20619](https://github.com/battlefield-portal-community/portal-docs/blob/e47049b63e51188248b798c13df021a40e9a89fc/generators/santiago/mod/index.d.ts#L20619)

Sets the target player to skip the mandown state and go directly to the deploy screen when killed.
